name: Wallbangerz
description:
Cover (n) - a thing which lies on, over, or around something, especially in order to protect or conceal it. It's been a fundamental part of shooter games forever, and it's about time someone flipped it on its head. In normal shooters, cover is used to take shelter from enemies; in Wallbangerz, it's the opposite. Just shooting enemies won't work; the bullet must pass through at least one other object before striking them to do damage.

Just be warned that the enemy's guns work normally, so don't get too carried away. They come in waves too, so don't get too cocky.

Controls:

Move- W, A, S, D

Pick up weapon - E

Reload weapon - R

Fire weapon - Left mouse

Pause - Escape

If you encounter a bug please leave a comment and I'll fix it.
